title: IG Reels Editor – $5 Per Video – Long-Term Weekly Work
job_overview:
I’m building my IG and want someone to help me with content. I’ll send you raw videos — you edit them into simple, clean Reels with captions and music. No crazy effects. Just good, clean edits that feel natural and look sharp.

I want someone reliable, creative, and easy to work with. Someone who takes this seriously and can grow with me.

Here’s what I need for now:

-Clean cuts
-Easy-to-read captions (like Hormozi or business pages)
-Light background music

Final video should be 30–60 seconds, vertical (9:16)

We’ll start with 2–3 Reels per week at $5 per video.
If things go well, I’m open to hiring you full-time at $100–$150/month to:

-Edit Reels weekly
-Post them to my IG (after approval)
-Write short captions + hashtags
-Help with thumbnails or other content stuff

This could become long-term if you’re the right person.

Also, just to make sure you actually read this — what’s 7 + 3?
Write the answer as a word, not a number. If you skip this, I’m not reading your message.
